q1.question: Is this platform suitable for small construction teams?
q1.answer: Yes! Our platform is designed for both small and large teams working on modular or site-based construction.

q2.question: Can I use it offline?
q2.answer: You can view cached data offline. Full functionality requires internet connection.

q3.question: Do you offer support during implementation?
q3.answer: Yes, our team provides full setup guidance and ongoing technical support.
